title.rendered: Endeavor Air Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Endeavor Air, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Delta Air Lines, is the world’s largest operator of CRJ-900 aircraft. Flying as Delta Connection, Endeavor operates 154 regional jets on 800 daily flights to more than 140 cities in the United States and across North America. Headquartered in Minneapolis, Minn., Endeavor has hub operations in Atlanta, Detroit, Minneapolis, and New York City.

 

 

Address : Endeavor Air
7500 Airline Drive
Minneapolis, MN 55450

Phone : 800.603.4594

Reservations/Customer Solutions: 800.221.1212 (All reservations are handled by Delta Air Lines)

Endeavor Air Official website :  http://www.endeavorair.com

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Endeavor Air

  • CRJ-900
  • CRJ-700
  • CRJ-200

Endeavor Air Baggage Allowance

Endeavor Air Baggage Allowance

View Endeavor Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Frequent-flyer program: SkyMiles

Queries handled by Endeavor Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Endeavor Air Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Endeavor Air : (click on the stars below)
